catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 245, horizontal ōban #55.04
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Elaine C. Norden  in memory of her sister, Miss Esther M. Cleveland
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi no uchi 東海道五十三次之内), also known as the First Tōkaidō or Hōeidō Tōkaidō
text: No. 04 in the series, second, recut version; published by Hōeidō alone.
title: Kanagawa: View of the Embankment
